name: StatinsAllergyIntolerance
title: Statins Allergy Intolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR Allergy Intolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Statins medications),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:STATIN:),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are Statins, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to  Statins medications as a class, or individual  Statins medications),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
